home.heroText: Where Ancient Wisdom Meets Your Destiny

divination.title: Ifa Divination
divination.desc: Access divine wisdom through the sacred oracle of Orunmila. Receive guidance specific to your life path.

spiritual.title: Spiritual Guidance
spiritual.desc: Align with your destiny and find your true path. Connect with ancestral wisdom for life direction.

herbal.title: Herbal Healing
herbal.desc: Traditional remedies rooted in ancestral knowledge. Natural solutions for wellness and protection.

advisory.title: Life Advisory
advisory.desc: Wisdom for family, business, and major life decisions. Navigate challenges with ancient insight.

authentic.title: Authentic Babalawo Practice
authentic.desc: Genuine Ifa tradition passed down through sacred lineage

confidential.title: Confidential Consultations
confidential.desc: Your matters are handled with utmost discretion

cta2.title: Your Path to Clarity Awaits
cta2.text: Take the first step. Consult with Ifa today.

about.title: About Ifangbayelo
about.subtitle: A Bridge to Ancient Wisdom
about.intro: Ifangbayelo Trado Medicare stands as a beacon of authentic Yoruba traditional practice, offering guidance rooted in the sacred wisdom of Ifa.

story.title: Our Story
story.p1: Founded with deep reverence for the Ifa tradition, Ifangbayelo Trado Medicare serves as a bridge between the ancient wisdom of our ancestors and the seekers of today.
story.p2: We believe that the wisdom of Orunmila offers profound guidance for navigating the complexities of modern life.

philosophy.title: Our Philosophy
philosophy.text: Ifa is not merely divination; it is a complete philosophy of life, encompassing ethics, health, community, and spiritual growth.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Traditional Wisdom for Modern Life
services.intro: We offer services rooted in authentic Ifa tradition, tailored to meet your spiritual, emotional, and practical needs.

orunmila.title: Orunmila & The Way of Ifa
orunmila.subtitle: Understanding the Source of Wisdom
orunmila.intro: Ifa is one of the world's oldest and most sophisticated systems of knowledge.

who.title: Who is Orunmila?
who.text: Orunmila is the Orisa of wisdom, knowledge, and divination in Yoruba spirituality. He was present at creation and witnessed every destiny unfold.

what.title: What is Ifa?
what.text: Ifa is a comprehensive body of knowledge encompassing spirituality, philosophy, history, medicine, and ethics.

odu.title: The 16 Principal Odu Ifa
odu.subtitle: OJU ODU MERINDINLOGUN
odu.intro: These are the 16 principal Odu (Oju Odu or Olodu), the foundation of the 256 Odu Ifa. Each carries profound wisdom and represents fundamental aspects of existence.

note.title: About the 256 Odu
note.text: From these 16 principal Odu, all 240 Omo Odu (minor Odu) are derived through combination. Together, the 256 Odu form the complete corpus of Ifa, containing all wisdom about life, destiny, and the universe.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Begin Your Journey
contact.intro: We welcome all sincere seekers of wisdom. Reach out through WhatsApp, phone, or Facebook.
contact.whatsappDesc: Get quick responses and schedule consultations via WhatsApp messaging.
contact.callDesc: Speak directly with us for immediate assistance or inquiries.
contact.facebookDesc: Connect with us on Facebook for updates and spiritual insights.
